<h3 id="X34701">X(34701) = CENTER OF THE HR-ELLIPSE OF THESE TRIANGLES: AQUILA TO ANTI-MANDART-INCIRCLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 7*a^4-3*(b+c)*a^3-(5*b^2+2*b*c+5*c^2)*a^2+(b+c)*(3*b^2-2*b*c+3*c^2)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(34701) = 7*X(1)-4*X(13463) = 3*X(1)-2*X(34640) = 4*X(3)-X(12625) = 2*X(20)+X(11523) = X(20)+2*X(12437) = 2*X(944)+X(2136) = 3*X(1699)-2*X(34706) = 3*X(3158)-2*X(34619) = X(3189)+2*X(4297) = 2*X(3189)+X(6762) = 5*X(3522)+X(12536) = 5*X(3522)-2*X(24391) = 3*X(3679)-2*X(34700) = 3*X(4421)-X(34700) = X(11523)-4*X(12437) = X(12536)+2*X(24391) = 6*X(13463)-7*X(34640)</b>
<p>
The center of the reciprocal HR-ellipse of these triangles is X(34700)</p>
<p>X(34701) lies on these lines:
{1,528}, {2,950}, {3,12625}, {9,4304}, {20,527}, {30,1490}, {35,958}, {40,376}, {56,31146}, {78,11015}, {100,5727}, {145,2094}, {200,34606}, {381,33596}, {515,3158}, {517,34707}, {518,34620}, {529,34628}, {535,3811}, {551,1058}, {553,3241}, {960,5696}, {1043,17294}, {1420,11240}, {1699,34706}, {1706,3486}, {1837,6174}, {2646,31140}, {2900,6282}, {3243,4293}, {3245,3633}, {3419,30282}, {3434,13384}, {3488,5437}, {3522,12536}, {3576,24392}, {3586,5440}, {3632,3916}, {3655,34709}, {3680,5882}, {3813,30389}, {3870,34605}, {3880,10167}, {3885,10031}, {3895,6224}, {3913,5537}, {3984,15680}, {4190,11518}, {4294,15829}, {4511,9580}, {4654,17579}, {4668,32157}, {4853,34720}, {4930,28198}, {5219,9963}, {5691,11236}, {5722,9945}, {5731,5853}, {5732,34742}, {5881,6906}, {5903,24473}, {6172,20007}, {6765,18481}, {6901,9624}, {6934,7982}, {7962,20075}, {9579,31164}, {11235,17614}, {11248,28204}, {11682,20066}, {12526,15338}, {12565,34630}, {12635,28534}, {15670,19875}, {15678,31938}, {16548,18596}, {17528,24929}, {17532,33595}, {17571,31446}, {25568,28164}, {30144,34649}, {31162,34629}</p>
<p>
X(34701) = midpoint of X(3189) and X(34610)<br>
X(34701) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3679, 4421), (3928, 376), (5691, 11236), (6762, 34610), (24392, 3576), (34610, 4297), (34711, 34639)<br>
X(34701) = pole of the line {3962, 18839} wrt Feuerbach hyperbola<br>
X(34701) = pole of the line {2826, 3737} wrt hexyl circle<br>
X(34701) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 11112, 6173), (20, 12437, 11523), (78, 11114, 31142), (3189, 4297, 6762), (3522, 12536, 24391), (3586, 5440, 30827), (34607, 34711, 34639)<br>
</p>
